attributes.action: Subsidise the entertainment/theatre/cinema industry to survive COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: We need to protect the British entertainment and cultural sector, to ensure it survives the epidemic of COVID-19.  We need to ensure British culture doesn’t suffer anymore and people can retain jobs.
attributes.background:
The government need to offer the entertainment industries, such as theatres, cinema and other entertainment sectors monetary subsidies to survive the COVID-19 epidemic.  

Cineworld are having to close putting 5,000 jobs at risk putting other entertainment venues and industries at risk.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Offer more support to the arts (particularly Theatres and Music) amidst COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320711

Provide increased support to the cinema industry to protect it and employees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553300
